title: Ep. 35: A Very Healthy Pod. Celery Juice, New Cookbooks, Upright Training, & Healthy Intentions.
itunes:title: Ep. 35: A Very Healthy Pod. Celery Juice, New Cookbooks, Upright Training, & Healthy Intentions.
description:
In this episode, we are talking all things wellness! We evaluate our health goals for 2019 and how we're doing. We talk about our current health-strengths, and where we need improvement (Grace admits "Dry-January" isn't going as planned)! Becca is on a cookbook craze and Grace is a solid week into the celery juice craze.

Also in this episode, Grace got a gadget to fix her posture and Becca has a book hangover!   

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
content:encoded:
